outcomes.3: Upon going downstairs, you find yourself surrounded by oddly shaped wooden statues, twisted in some crude demeanor, horrors of the unknown made of wood. But there's nobody there. After investigating the creepy room, you find a box with something inside...

outcomes.0: Even after uncovering the dark machinations, you decide to abandon the helpless folks and leave them to their demise.
outcomes.1: Vous partez en courant, sans savoir quand le village entier sera avalé par la mort s'il l'est. Dans votre fuite précipitée, vous trébuchez et tombez dans un fossé.
outcomes.2: After dashing out of the village, you take a short rest to catch your breath. While doing so, you are approached by some armed figures dressed in black. Seems like they didn't like you snooping around the village. They draw their weapons and attack. Catching you off guard and exhausted, they beat you into unconsciousness.
outcomes.3: You make it out of the cursed village alive. After some time, you stumble upon a beautiful piece of untouched land. You can see a waterfall and multiple tamed carnivores. You decide to meditate under the stream of falling water. After an hour, you feel energized and continue your journey.

goAway.text: Get out of there as fast as possible.

outcomes.0: Vous trouvez des personnages vêtus de noir dans ledit sous-sol. Il semble qu'il ne s'agisse pas de bêtes, mais de gens ordinaires qui parient sur des combats de coqs. Vous les rejoignez et pariez sur le coq rouge qui, au final, a perdu. Ce qui vous rendra plus léger de quelques pièces.
outcomes.1: Vous trouvez des personnages vêtus de noir dans ledit sous-sol. Il semble qu'il ne s'agisse pas de bêtes, mais de gens ordinaires qui parient sur des combats de coqs. Vous les rejoignez et pariez sur le coq bleu qui, au final, a gagné. Plus riche de quelques pièces, vous laissez les hommes à leurs jeux et vous partez.
outcomes.2: You meet 4 black-hooded men in the basement. After convincing them to let you join them, they reveal their plan of sacrificing the local folks' vital force to a devil they worship. Hoping to take advantage of their knowledge, you say you're willing to participate. You and the cultists sacrifice a girl and some animals. Furthermore, you spread their innards throughout the room. Yet nothing happens. After wasting your time, you angrily stomp away...
outcomes.3: You meet 4 black-hooded men in the basement. After convincing them to let you join them, they reveal their plan of sacrificing the local folks' life force to a devil they worship. Hoping you'll take profit of their knowledge, you say you're willing to participate. You and the cultists sacrifice a woman and some animals. Furthermore, you spread their innards throughout the room. Yet nothing happens. It's only when you walk away from the room that you stumble upon guards...

helpThem.text: Try to find the cultists in order to help them.

outcomes.0: Sans le vérifier vous-même, vous commencez à courir dans le village comme un fou, en hurlant à tout le monde qu'ils vont mourir s'ils restent. Une panique générale s'ensuit et tout le monde commence à quitter le périmètre. Mais, au bout d'un certain temps, rien ne se passe et certains ne sont pas très contents de votre mauvaise farce. Ils se liguent contre vous, vous frappent, et vous volent.
outcomes.1: You tell the guards where the malevolent entities are hiding. They follow up on your tip and, after some minutes pass, another guard approaches you. It seems that heretics were about to kill a fair maiden and, thanks to your hint, she was saved. He hands you a small pouch before shaking your hand.
outcomes.2: After telling everyone about the dark misfortune that is about to hit the village, everyone packs up their stuff and stays just outside in the forest. When suddenly an earthquake hits and panic ensues. You help the guards calming down the masses which, after some time, quiet down. You are warmly thanked for the warning.
outcomes.3: Vous tentez de convaincre tout le monde qu'ils sont en danger, mais les gens ne veulent rien savoir et vous ignorent tout simplement. Vous essayez pendant plusieurs heures et, enfin, décidez de les laisser. Vous continuez votre voyage sans vous soucier des gens bornés de ce village.

warnEveryone.text: Revealing to everyone what it's all about.

63.text: After some time, you finally arrive at Boug-Coton where some supposedly unholy creatures are into something... After investigating the place for a couple of days, you find a clue. There are reports of weird sounds and sightings of figures dresed in black going in and out of a barn's basement. Seems that a dark ritual is underway...

outcomes.0: You accept the invitation, you are jovial just at the thought of celebrating in the King's sumptuous castle. You stride towards the imposing building.
Les fêtes ne sont pas pour vous. Vous décidez que vous avez mieux à faire que de vous amuser et repartez vers l'aventure.
You didn't expect to read this. You stay for long minutes contemplating the letter. The departure of the messenger pulls you out of your daydream, and you take the destination of the castle.

64.text: No sooner have you arrived at your destination than a messenger stops breathlessly in front of you and hands you a missive. You carefully read the contents, which indicate that the King is preparing a great feast in his castle, and that you are invited to attend.

outcomes.0: Vous ouvrez votre cadeau et voyez des pièces briller au fond de la boite. Vous les prenez et les ajoutez à votre bourse. Vous partez du château, heureux d'avoir reçu ce cadeau.
outcomes.1: Vous ouvrez votre cadeau et voyez une potion brillant d'un rouge étincelant dans la boite. Vous la buvez et vous sentez une force jaillir du fond de votre corps. Vous partez du château, heureux d'avoir reçu ce cadeau.
outcomes.2: Vous ouvrez votre cadeau et voyez des gemmes roulant au fond de la boite. Vous les prenez et les ajoutez à votre réserve de gemmes. Vous partez du château, heureux d'avoir reçu ce cadeau.
outcomes.3: Vous ouvrez votre cadeau et prenez un livre qui se trouvait dedans. Il explique des techniques de survie que vous avez hâte de mettre en pratique. Vous partez du château, heureux d'avoir reçu ce cadeau.
outcomes.4: Vous ouvrez votre cadeau et prenez un livre qui se trouvait dedans. Il explique des techniques de combat que vous avez hâte d'essayer contre les autres aventuriers. Vous partez du château, heureux d'avoir reçu ce cadeau.
outcomes.5: Vous ouvrez votre cadeau et en sortez un équipement. C'est une arme puissante que vous ajoutez à votre collection. Vous partez du château, heureux d'avoir reçu ce cadeau.
outcomes.6: Vous ouvrez votre cadeau et en sortez un équipement. C'est une armure puissante que vous ajoutez à votre collection. Vous partez du château, heureux d'avoir reçu ce cadeau.
outcomes.7: Vous ouvrez votre cadeau et en sortez un équipement. C'est un objet puissant que vous ajoutez à votre collection. Vous partez du château, heureux d'avoir reçu ce cadeau.

outcomes.0: Vous ouvrez votre cadeau et en sortez un équipement. C'est une armure puissante que vous ajoutez à votre collection. Vous partez du château, heureux d'avoir reçu ce cadeau.

hopeArmor.text: Wait and hope to get a new armor.

outcomes.0: Vous ouvrez votre cadeau et voyez des gemmes roulant au fond de la boite. Vous les prenez et les ajoutez à votre réserve de gemmes. Vous partez du château, heureux d'avoir reçu ce cadeau.

hopeGems.text: Wait and hope to get gems.

outcomes.0: Vous ouvrez votre cadeau et prenez un livre qui se trouvait dedans. Il explique des techniques de combat que vous avez hâte d'essayer contre les autres aventuriers. Vous partez du château, heureux d'avoir reçu ce cadeau.

hopeGlory.text: Wait and hope to get glory.

outcomes.0: Vous ouvrez votre cadeau et voyez une potion brillant d'un rouge étincelant dans la boite. Vous la buvez et vous sentez une force jaillir du fond de votre corps. Vous partez du château, heureux d'avoir reçu ce cadeau.

hopeHealthy.text: Wait and hope to get something to stay healthy.

outcomes.0: Vous ouvrez votre cadeau et en sortez un équipement. C'est un objet puissant que vous ajoutez à votre collection. Vous partez du château, heureux d'avoir reçu ce cadeau.

hopeItem.text: Wait and hope for a new object.

outcomes.0: Vous ouvrez votre cadeau et voyez des pièces briller au fond de la boite. Vous les prenez et les ajoutez à votre bourse. Vous partez du château, heureux d'avoir reçu ce cadeau.
Vous ouvrez votre cadeau et y trouvez un animal. Vous décidez de l'emmener avec vous dans vos grandes aventures sur le continent. Vous partez du château, heureux d'avoir reçu ce cadeau.

hopePet.text: Wait and hope for a companion.

outcomes.0: Vous ouvrez votre cadeau et en sortez un équipement. C'est une arme puissante que vous ajoutez à votre collection. Vous partez du château, heureux d'avoir reçu ce cadeau.

hopeWeapon.text: Wait and hope for a new weapon.

outcomes.0: Vous ouvrez votre cadeau et prenez un livre qui se trouvait dedans. Il explique des techniques de survie que vous avez hâte de mettre en pratique. Vous partez du château, heureux d'avoir reçu ce cadeau.

65.text: Like many other adventurers, you arrive in the reception hall of the King's castle. In the middle of the hall stands a gigantic fir tree, protecting thousands of gifts with its long, thorny branches. After a delicious meal, the King takes the stage and announces that the night before, a man in a red suit was seen in the night, and that when he left, thousands of gifts with the names of adventurers were strewn under the tree. He asks you to remain seated and wait for a waiter to come and drop off what you're owed.

outcomes.0: Subitement, vous êtes allongé sur le sol, l'équipage penché au-dessus de vous. Le capitaine vous explique que vous êtes évanoui. Ils vous saisissent et, tel un paquet, vous lancent par dessus bord avant de s'éloigner rapidement.
outcomes.1: Suddenly, you're lying on the floor, the crew leaning over you. The captain explains that you've fainted. He gives you a few more words of advice before letting you leave for the island.

outcomes.0: Vous vous tournez lentement vers le capitaine pour lui demander s'il aurait l'immense amabilité de vous fournir un complément d'information. Il vous en donne quelques uns et vous partez, plus prêt que jamais pour affronter l'île.
outcomes.1: Inquiet, vous regardez le capitaine et le remerciez poliment pour la traversée. Vous lui exprimez vos craintes et demandez quelques conseils. Il vous en donne quelques uns et vous partez, plus prêt que jamais pour affronter l'île.

outcomes.0: You leap abruptly over the boat's deck and run straight ahead, like an animal, without looking back. All this while the crew looks on in amazement.
outcomes.1: While thanking the crew for this wonderful crossing, you disembark. You walk away, confident and sure-footed.

66.text: After a brief crossing, the captain moors his ship at what appears to be a pier. You are far too absorbed in your contemplation of the island to care. It seems to you at the same time tiny and immense, warm and cold. A strange sensation seizes you, between anguish and admiration. A movement on the ship pulls you out of your observation.

outcomes.0: You take the time to enjoy this beverage that you missed so much on your getaway. It does you a world of good. You sip it, and begin to feel the ship rocking on the waves, a sign of the end of this expedition.
outcomes.1: This beverage is not of good quality, the malty taste is very noticeable. Seeing your reaction, the captain laughs and tells you that beer is like that on ships. He takes your glass back and goes to fetch you water and a piece of bread instead, which you enjoy a little more. You then stand up, watch the island drift away on the horizon and take stock of your adventures.

outcomes.0: Vous n'avez pas la tête à boire après cette aventure périlleuse. Ne souhaitant pas vous laisser dans votre position inconfortable, le capitaine vous offre, sans que vous ayez vraiment le choix, un lit douillet dans sa cabine. Le mouvement du bateau vous berce, vous sentez vite votre esprit s'égarer sur vos péripéties et vous vous endormez quelques minutes après.
outcomes.1: You've been through a lot on this trip, so you refuse, as you don't want to get any more dehydrated. Instead, you ask the ship's master for some water. But you don't realize you're falling into a deep sleep until he returns.

outcomes.0: The captain is waiting for you to take his gift. But you've fallen asleep in a fraction of a second, which he quickly realizes. So he goes back to steering his boat, leaving you to sleep where you are.

67.text: After a short walk, you arrive at the boat that previously brought you to this inhospitable island. Seeing your fatigue and injuries, the captain hastens to order his crew to weigh anchor. Once seated on deck, you see him arrive with a mug of beer in his hand, which he hands to you.

outcomes.0: You look at the calendar and discover that a tournament is about to start! You decide to go along and reach the final after a few hours of fighting. However, your opponent dominates you and you miss your last battle. As a finalist, you still win a purse full of gold before going on your way.
outcomes.1: You look at the calendar, and notice that you are in Lapland, the 6th month of the year. You then decide to go out and eat a pancake at a nearby stand. This food is so good you feel really happy. You resume your journey, well sated.
outcomes.2: When you see the calendar, you remember the posters in the streets talking about a treasure hunt. You decide to take part. After two hours of searching, you can't find anything. You decide to turn back.
outcomes.3: You are looking at the calendar, and you notice something of interest in today's entry: Mead competition! Confident in your strong alcohol resistance, you decide to give it a try. You end up winning the contest, as well as a reward! You are also totally drunk, however.

outcomes.0: You hang around the library and don't notice the minutes passing. At closing time, you step outside and realize that it's already late. You set off again without further ado.
outcomes.1: You're amazed at the number of books and the wealth of knowledge that emanates from these premises. Shortly afterwards, the librarian beckons: the building is about to close. Disappointed, you turn back to continue your adventures.
outcomes.2: You stay in the library for several minutes, amazed by all the knowledge held within. You sit down, thoughtful. Suddenly, a reader comes by and disturb your thoughts, "Hansel and Gretel" by the brothers Grimm in hand. He asks that you give him your seat, as you are in his most favourite spot. Confused, you leave, without any new knowledge.

outcomes.0: You decide to read a book. It's about cooking and preparing delicious meals. You write down the recipe before going to find the ingredients. Once you've found them, you follow the instructions to the letter. You taste your dish before feeling its benefits, then set off again.
outcomes.1: You pick up a book and start reading. The book is about arithmetic. However, this has never been your strong point: almost 10 minutes later, you decide to put the book down and continue on your way.
outcomes.2: You're reading a cookbook. It talks about a delicious dish. Aroused, you decide to prepare the dish. But you don't quite follow the instructions, and after eating, you don't feel well...
outcomes.3: You pick up the first book you come across. It is about alchemy and the diverse benefits of some plants. After carefully studying its content, you put it down, convinced that it will be useful on your following adventures.

outcomes.0: You manage to steal a dusty old book and sneak out of the building to find a buyer on the city's main avenues. However, you notice that no one is interested in the book, not least because it's badly damaged and even has torn pages. So you abandon it and move on.
outcomes.1: You sneak out of the library without anyone noticing you. You managed to steal a book, and now try to sell it to passers-by. A man decides to buy it for a few gold coins. Once the transaction is completed, you get back on track.
outcomes.2: You try to steal a golden book discreetly, but the librarian catches you red-handed. She demands that you return the precious book, and with it, compensation! Disappointed and ashamed, you return the book and compensate her with a large handful of your savings to avoid going to prison...

steal.text: Attempt to steal a book and resell it.

68.text: After strolling through the streets of Claire de Ville, you come across a building whose entrance is framed by two stone owl statues. As you approach, you realize that this is the town's library. You decide to enter the building to pass the time. On one of the entrance walls hangs a calendar made of large leaves bound together by a leather strap.

outcomes.0: You feel like you're participating in a knighthood ceremony, since Donia puts the end of the staff on both your shoulders - first on the left one, then on the right - to give you her blessings. Either way, you don't feel that much different from before.
outcomes.1: You feel overpowered after her blessing... until Donia leaves. You try to find her, embarrassed to have believed such folly, but you can't. You leave, ashamed and confused, and swear, a little too late, that she won't fool you again.
outcomes.2: As soon as Donia uses her "blessing" on you, she also throw some strange blue powder in your face. You get drowsy and she helps you to walk to one of the nearest trees, where you fall asleep. You dream of being in the royal palace, during a social event. You see the princess approaching you, with her face hidden by a dark veil, since you are actually oblivious to her physical appearance. You spend the rest of the dream dancing with her. You sleep a few hours feeling refreshed.

outcomes.0: She seems disappointed, but offers you a red rose as a gift for the princess. You set off again, just as disappointed as she is, having received only a single, measly flower.
outcomes.1: Rather than a blessing, you ask her if she knows of a place in this forest where you could rest for a while. She then takes you to her house, where you are served good food and wine. The latter is incredibly pleasant and you finish the whole bottle, dragging yourselves afterwards to a bed. As you sleep, you have a rather peculiar nightmare: Donia is a stooped old woman, the archetypal witch, and she wants to kill you before baking you in her oven. The real Donia leaves you asleep and continues on her way.

outcomes.0: You frown, and soon tell her that fairies don't exist and that she's completely delusional. Furious, Donia uses her stick to beat you up, leaving you lying wounded on a bed of leaves.
outcomes.1: You use all your tact and try to make her understand that fairies only exist in children's stories and tales of drunken adventurers, without much success. Wanting to prove you wrong, Donia pulls out a large quantity of red powder from a small satchel strapped to her waist, which she throws in your face. You're too close to her to dodge, so you inhale the powder. Your vision blurs and you lose your senses. You let Donia hold your hands and guide you to a clearing. You see many little fairies twirling about. In reality, they're wasps. Seeing your arrival as a threat, they sting you repeatedly. You've been poisoned and will need some time to get better.

outcomes.0: As you stare at her in silence for quite a while, Donia seems to lose interest in you, and walks away without saying anything more. But you continue to stare. Without a thought. It's only a few hours later that you come to your senses, and continue your journey, as if nothing had happened...

69.text: As you cross the Old Man's Forest, a beautiful woman comes running up to you. Her long hair is the color of a stormy sea, and she's dressed in a graceful silver gown, with a corset adorned with tiny sapphires. Her right hand holds a hawthorn staff. Such an appearance makes you immediately think that this is what a fairy should look like, if such a creature exists: both wild and dazzling. You're worried, but the stranger smiles sweetly and announces that her name is Donia. She declares herself to be a Fae, confirming your first impressions. You don't quite believe this, and sense the trickery afoot, but her staff seems dangerous enough for you not to let her know. Donia then offers you her blessing, believing she can be useful in your quest for the princess.

outcomes.0: En forçant la porte, vous vous blessez profondément. Il faut absolument vous soigner !
outcomes.1: Après avoir passé presque 1 heure à tenter de rentrer dans la maison, vous finissez par abandonner. En partant, vous trouvez un objet qui pourra peut être vous être utile !
outcomes.2: You enter the house and put down your belongings to rest. Having fallen into a deep sleep, you'll need to rest before continuing your adventure.
outcomes.3: You enter the house and search around for about fifteen minutes. On your way out, you find an object that might come in handy!
outcomes.4: You enter the house and search around for about fifteen minutes. You finally give up your search without having found anything.

outcomes.0: You've been standing still for almost 15 minutes, so it's time to get moving!
You continue on your way without worrying about the house.

7.text: You've discovered a house! It looks abandoned...

outcomes.0: Après un petit temps de réflexion, vous décidez finalement d'entrer dans le tombeau pour vous rafraîchir à l'ombre et vous reposer.
outcomes.1: As you hesitate about what to do, the sandstorm intensifies. You step into the passage, safe in the knowledge that the gusts have subsided.
outcomes.2: As you hesitate to decide what to do, a woman wearing an ice axe on her belt emerges from the trapdoor. She threatens you with a bandaged bow, then orders you to turn your back on her, which you do. A sharp blow to the temple leaves you confused for several minutes.

outcomes.0: You wander the galleries for a while, looking for any hidden rooms. Eventually, you come to a dead end. Fearing you'll get lost exploring further, you decide to turn back.
outcomes.1: After wandering through several rooms, including one filled with spoiled victuals, you arrive in a vast room where gold is the name of the game. It makes up the walls, the various objects, the clothes and even the chests. In one corner, you spot something you might find useful. Then you fill up your biggest purse and leave the maze.
outcomes.2: Once through the trapdoor, you walk until you come to a dead end. You decide to get out, for fear of getting lost. As you reach the trapdoor, you are savagely attacked by an individual wearing a brown hat and carrying a whip on his belt. You somehow manage to dodge most of the blows, and fight back. You fight for a long time, but finally deliver the decisive blow. While searching him, you discover a small purse containing a substantial sum of money.
outcomes.3: Once through the trapdoor, you walk until you discover a burial chamber, the underground is a tomb! Wanting to turn back, you fail to recognize the corridors you're passing through, and wander for many hours before finding an exit. You resume your adventure as the full moon illuminates the silent desert as if it were daylight.
outcomes.4: After passing through the trapdoor, you step into the darkness and discover a strange place: an abandoned crypt, the underground tunnels resembling a funerary maze! You're tempted to turn back, but to your dismay, the corridors seem to play tricks on your senses and transform before you. You wander aimlessly for a time, before finally finding a way out.
outcomes.5: Once through the trapdoor, you walk to a room where a sphinx is enthroned, made entirely of gold! As if hypnotized, you approach it until your left foot lands on a slab, which sinks into the floor... Two golden arrows whistle eerily in your ears, while a third scratches your arm. It's not an unpleasant wound, but this trap urges you to evacuate.

outcomes.0: You decide to ignore the trapdoor: you feel it would be far too dangerous to explore an underground passage. The sandy gusts have subsided, which is a godsend for you!
outcomes.1: You decide to ignore the trapdoor and continue on your way, but the sandstorm becomes even more virulent. Without the slightest hesitation, you turn back for shelter. You decide to rest here until the storm is over.
outcomes.2: The gusts are getting stronger, so you tear off a piece of your top to protect your respiratory tracts. With difficulty, you take a few steps and spot several cacti, some with fruit. After picking up two of them, you quickly find a dune where you can take shelter. Once peeled, you discover that the fruit is delicious. Many minutes later, the storm has died down. You resume your adventure.
outcomes.3: After carefully closing the trapdoor, you continue on your way. Suddenly, the ground gives way beneath your feet. You fall into one of the underground rooms. In your fall, you cut your thigh. Fortunately, you get out with ease.

70.text: As you travel through the Dune, the air seems to grow drier and drier. As you move forward, grains of sand whirl around, forcing you to squint. Suddenly, you feel the ground firm up beneath your feet for the space of a step. Surprised, you push the sand aside to reveal a trapdoor and open it. A gigantic labyrinth is revealed before your astonished eyes.

outcomes.0: Vous suivez le vieil homme jusqu'à la tente qui lui sert de maison et le laissez vous servir une étrange mixture qu'il dit être une délicieuse soupe de peyotl. Par politesse, vous la buvez. Il ne vous faut que quelques instants pour subir les effets de cette soupe démoniaque : votre vision se brouille, et le monde oscille. Soudain effrayé par l'ermite fou, vous prenez la fuite dans le désert. Au petit matin, vous vous réveillez avec une migraine atroce, les effets du peyotl mettront un moment avant de disparaître complètement.
outcomes.1: You follow the old man to the tent that serves as his home and share a meal together around the fire, while he tells you his story. He explains that he and his brother separated for their hermitage following a disaster that killed their entire family, the only survivors being him and his brother. His story touches you deeply, and the name of another hermit whose name begins with an X sounds familiar... The desert is icy cold as you fall asleep by the fire with the hermit. When you wake up in the morning, you find a beautiful scorpion in one of your shoes. You throw it away and continue on your way.
outcomes.2: Vous suivez le vieil homme jusqu'à la tente qui lui sert de maison et partagez un repas ensemble autour de feu tout en racontant vos aventures. Après vous être bien rassasié et avoir remercié l'ermite, vous reprenez votre traversée du désert en vous enfonçant dans les méandres du désert.

outcomes.0: You politely decline the hermit's offer and continue your journey.
outcomes.1: Seeing that you're reluctant to accept, the old man pulls you by the arm and invites you to tea, where you chat with him as you sip the beverage. After a short while, you bid farewell to the old man and set off again.
outcomes.2: Seeing that you are reluctant to accept, the old man decides to offer you "an object from his personal collection". You accept the gift but remain reserved about staying in his company and decide to take your leave quickly.
outcomes.3: You decline his offer, but just as you're about to set off again, he calls out to you again, talking about anything and everything. After a while, finding him far too suspicious and thinking he's trying to set a trap for you, you decide to cut short his interminable monologue before fleeing as quickly as possible.

deny.text: Decline his offer and move on.

outcomes.0: The man looks suspicious and his gait is deceitful. As he stretches out his arm to ask if you're feeling well, you grab hold of him and shove him into the water before scurrying away.
outcomes.1: Seeing you reactionless, the old man gets offended, yells at you and throws a handful of sand in your face before walking away. Completely blinded, you head for the small body of water to rinse the sand from your eyes. After a few minutes, you feel better and go on your way.

outcomes.0: You let the man guide you to his tent and discreetly pick up a large stone while his back is turned to you. You then land a heavy blow on his hooded skull. The hermit collapses, blood spilling onto the cracked oasis floor. You decide to leave him like that, and head off to take a look inside the tent. Inside, you discover trunks set with jewels and objects in great quantity. You leave with a substantial sum of money, as well as an item you grabbed in a hurry. You quickly resume your crossing, unwilling to be caught red-handed.
outcomes.1: You let the man guide you to his tent and discreetly pick up a large stone while his back is turned to you. Just as you're about to hit him, he turns and pulls a dagger from his sleeve, cutting deep into your chest. You scramble for cover, doing your best to stop the blood flowing. As you flee, you hear the crazy old man's demented laughter.
outcomes.2: You let the man guide you to his tent and discreetly pick up a large stone while his back is turned to you. You land a heavy blow on his hooded head, the hermit collapses to the ground, and you are immediately overcome with remorse. You bandage the old man's head and lay him down on his mat to recover. When he wakes up, you apologize and give him some money in compensation for your misdeed.
outcomes.3: As you follow the old man, you pick up a stone from the ground behind his back. Discretion is not your strong suit, and the hermit immediately notices your suspicious silence. Realizing the situation, he repudiates you from his kyutchen with a punch the likes of which you've never received.

steal.text: Accept and take advantage of the night to steal his belongings.

71.text: As you cross the Kings' Valley, you catch sight of an oasis. Thirsty from your journey, you rush to the small body of water to drink. As you take a drink, you are startled by the sound of laughter behind you. As you turn around, a bearded old man with a large hood over his face faces you. He says his name is Xirtex and that he lives in this oasis. He offers to put you up in his home to help you recover from your journey, and to share your misadventures.

outcomes.0: Hesitantly, but finally galvanized by the din of the crowd, you ignore the judge and join in the general enthusiasm. You cheer the participants in the various events for hours!
outcomes.1: Your own life is far more important to you than the ephemeral glory of some tournament victory. You thank the judge and tell him that you won't be taking part in the tournament after all.

outcomes.0: The test seems a little difficult: you have to shoot three arrows at a straw target some 50 meters away. All three arrows land in the middle of the straw target. You're the winner! The beautiful Lady of the local Lord, Yseldia, comes to offer you a heavy purse, while you are dazzled by her ruby-set crown.
outcomes.1: The test seems a little difficult: you have to shoot three arrows at a straw placed about fifty meters away from you. You're not very skillful, so you miss two out of the three arrows and come last in the ranking! Happy to have been part of the general euphoria, you happily set off again.
outcomes.2: As you notch your first arrow, a sneeze startles you. You drop your bow, and your arrow comes to rest near the head of a muscular knight. He glares at you and starts to rush towards you. Adventure doesn't wait: you're back on the road in no time!

outcomes.0: After winning three jousts, you find yourself in the final against the Count of the neighboring region. He unhorses you with suppleness and ease. You finish second on the podium. As you are transfixed by the ruby-set crown of Yseldia, wife of the local lord, you absently accept a heavy purse from her delicate hands.
outcomes.1: A new jousting event is about to begin, and a groom has given you the gift of a gray double pony whose previous owner sadly passed away shortly before. You face Yvain, a renowned knight. You begin to gallop along with your adversary, who unhorses you with ease. As you land with a clatter on the dusty ground, your mount accidentally steps on one of your collarbones, making a sinister cracking sound.
outcomes.2: After spotting an unattended bay nag, you seize it to take part in the jousting. You're the winner! The local lord's wife, nicknamed Yseldia, gives you your rewards in person.
outcomes.3: Just as you feel the exhilaration of jousting on horseback beckoning, you remember that you don't have a horse to take part in this event. Disappointed, you grumble and continue on your way.

joinJoust.text: Take part in the jousting test.

outcomes.0: As you see the other participants' gleaming, sharp weapons, your courage melts like snow in the sun. You decide to slip away quietly before your unfinished life is snatched from you.
outcomes.1: After nearly dying with a blow from a halberd encrusted with green gems, you finally put your last opponent out of action. The Weapon Herald announces your crushing victory! The Lady of the Lord, named Yseldia, brings you your reward in person. As you thank her, you study her delicate face, the top of which is adorned with a sumptuous ruby-set crown.
outcomes.2: After easily defeating almost all your opponents, you start to tire and lose your last fight! You notice a nasty gash on your hand, and head off in the direction of the town's bone-setter. He dresses your wound and insists that you rest for a while.
outcomes.3: You've underestimated the level of your opponents and, as a result, one of them knocks you down. Despite your pleas, your opponent, armed with a halberd adorned with emeralds, sneers and lacerates your arm up to the shoulder.

outcomes.0: The rhythm, rhymes and sounds of your poem captivate the crowd. You're acclaimed the winner! Yseldia, wife of the local Lord, presents you with your prize, not without a touch of emotion.
outcomes.1: A few minutes before the results are announced, you notice that your purse is missing. You've probably had it stolen before you got there. Good thing you didn't have all your gold on you! You leave without waiting for the rest of the festivities, empty-handed.
outcomes.2: As you loudly proclaim your poem in a lilting voice, you notice a damsel eyeing you with much fervor. Just as you've finished your tirade, the young woman grabs your hand and starts running! A few alleys further on, the young lady kisses you! She's not your Princess, but you don't let her distract you, and explain that your heart's already in the right place. As you bid her farewell, she gives you an object that may prove useful in your further adventures.

joinPoetry.text: Take part in the poetry test.

outcomes.0: You manage to find a street kitchen owned by a mixed-race woman. Her first name, Lucya, rings a bell. Over the course of the conversation, Lucya explains that she used to work at the famous Boug-Coton inn. However, she was far too thirsty for exciting adventure to accept this sedentary lifestyle. Delighted by your interest, the woman offers you a small vial of spiced mead. You're now refreshed and ready for your own adventures.
outcomes.1: You can't find any street food stall: an entertainer tells you that a big banquet is planned for much later. Disappointed by this news, you decide to leave town.
outcomes.2: You manage to find a street kitchen owned by a mixed-race woman. Her first name, Lucya, rings a bell. Shortly after starting up a conversation with her, you learn that she intends to open her own inn if she becomes bored with her life as a culinary adventurer. Thinking you're a very nice person, Lucya offers you a homemade wafer. This singular honey-tasting cookie delights your palate.

searchFood.text: Change your mind and go in search of a food stall.

72.text: As you arrive on the outskirts of Claire de Ville, you discover that many of its inhabitants have moved outside the great walls: a seigneurial tournament is in full swing! On the hoardings attached to the walls, jesters, troubadours, minstrels, heralds, bards and storytellers vociferate with joy, cheering each blow of sword, lance or mace. Enthralled by the mayhem and general cheerfulness, you decide to try your luck. You spot the storytelling judge, who accepts your entry and asks you which test you'd like to take part in.

outcomes.0: You leave the crowd to slip discreetly into the back of the overweight man's cart. Inside his modest home on wheels, you spot a cat with her kittens and immediately understand the deception! You approach the trainer and demand money in exchange for your silence.
outcomes.1: Fascinated by these adorable babies, you sneak around to the back of the trainer's cart to see if there are any others, so you can steal one to sell at a good price. However, only a nursing cat is present. Out of spite, you grab the prettiest kitten and hide it in your pouch. Clever as you are, you quickly find someone willing to make the exchange.
outcomes.2: You move away from the crowd to find a better place to watch the show. Absorbed by the spectacle, you don't look where your feet are landing, and fall into a heavy open trunk, carelessly abandoned in the middle of the path. Before you know what's happening, the trunk closes on you, knocking you unconscious. You don't wake up until much later.

outcomes.0: You're totally uninterested in this spectacle and prefer to flee the crowd to avoid the usual thieves of all kinds. They never miss an opportunity to rob rich and poor alike, at events such as this where onlookers crowd together, facilitating their misdeeds.
outcomes.1: Vous reprenez immédiatement votre route. Vous n'avez pas de temps à perdre dans ce genre de clowneries. Vous mettez bien longtemps à réaliser que vous êtes reparti en prenant le mauvais chemin et faites donc demi-tour, pestant d'avoir perdu ce précieux temps.
outcomes.2: You quickly leave the show and trip over a bag carelessly left by a spectator. As you fall, you injure yourself very slightly. The bag is a faded brown, and although the leather is worn, it's in relatively good condition. You decide to rummage through the bag in the hope of finding some sort of compensation, and discover a small purse and an object that seems to be quite useful.
outcomes.3: You decide to continue your adventure, indifferent to the spectacle and the cheers of the crowd.

outcomes.0: You stay to watch the show, amazed by all the cuteness. You've really enjoyed watching this magnificent and grandiose performance, so you offer the trainer a few coins.
outcomes.1: You're eager to see the show, but it ends just as you arrive. Although your disappointment is immense, you leave.
outcomes.2: You watch the training, but after all you've been through since the start of your adventure, you're not impressed. You promptly leave the crowd and return to your adventurous life.

outcomes.0: You soon realize that these are kittens. There's no doubt about it, as you've had the good fortune to come across tigers before, and they give birth to much larger tiger cubs. You declare this outrageous, and demand financial compensation from the crooks. They agree, on condition that you leave immediately.
outcomes.1: You watch the trainer, whip in hand, ready to attack a young tiger. Like a good defender of lost causes, you rush at him, screaming for him to stop and release these poor tigers. Before you can reach him, the man flogs you, to the applause of the furious crowd.
outcomes.2: The show comes to an end and, like an excellent businessman, the trainer offers to pet the tigers for a few coins. You shout to the audience that it's a scam, that they're just kittens, but nobody listens to you. You scream until you lose your voice, and finally leave.

73.text: Walking nonchalantly along the Road of Wonders, you approach a small group of people in a semicircle around a heavyset man. As you reach them, you notice that he's dressed in a tight-fitting red show suit, with yellow shoulder inserts and blue briefs pulled over the uniform. On his imposing chest is a small royal-blue crest, which you can't quite make out. You make your way through the many onlookers to the front row. The man is a wildcat trainer with a long brown leather whip, teaching two magnificent baby tigers a trick.

outcomes.0: Vous ne bougez pas, comme pétrifié. La femme prend cette réaction comme un refus et s'énerve. Elle vous lance des invectives marines et vous bombarde de poissons morts. Vous parvenez à en esquiver la plupart, mais un spécimen vous frappe en plein visage. Vous continuez à courir sans vous retourner.

The blend of flavors is divine, and a feeling of euphoria washes over you. Your eyes close despite yourself, and when you open them again, you discover you're on board a boat, rocked by the lapping of the waves.

eat.text: Take a big bite of the dish.

outcomes.0: La femme semble offensée par votre refus. Elle vous lance des invectives marines et vous bombarde de poissons morts. Vous parvenez à en esquiver la plupart, mais un spécimen vous frappe en plein visage. Vous continuez à courir sans vous retourner.

You lean in slightly, intrigued by the full-bodied scent emanating from the seafood dish, and the woman observes you with an intensity that gives you goose bumps. You're about to comment on the curious mixture when, suddenly, you feel her hands crush your face against the plate. The world turns wet and cold as your nose plunges into the dish. You meet the glassy gaze of a cooked fish, its eye gradually pressing against yours. Your senses capsize and darkness engulfs your vision. When you regain consciousness, you're greeted by the creak of wood and the smell of salt, feel a steady rocking motion and realize you're lying on the rough planks of a ship's deck.

74.text: As you stroll along aimlessly, your nostrils are suddenly assailed by an intense iodine scent. A strange woman in a fish-scale dress, her hair matted with dried seaweed, waves at you. She's surrounded by baskets overflowing with brightly-colored seafood and invites you, with a toothless but warm smile, to sample her culinary specialty: a dish lovingly simmered from the finest products of the ocean.

outcomes.0: You rest for a few minutes before slowly leaving towards the passes. You end up exhausted on the other side, so you'll need to rest before setting off again!
You cross the forest without too much difficulty, and continue your journey!
outcomes.1: Vous avancez lentement à travers les sapins. Sur le chemin, vous ramassez des branches de sapin et vous fabriquez des petits objets que vous pourrez utiliser ou revendre...
outcomes.2: Vous progressez lentement dans la forêt. Malheureusement, le sol est glissant et vous tombez au fond d'un fossé ! Vous parvenez à en ressortir, mais vous êtes blessé !

outcomes.0: Vous changez finalement d'avis et décidez de rester sur les plaines. Moins dangereux, ce chemin est également plus long, vous perdez beaucoup de temps !
outcomes.1: Vous changez finalement d'avis et décidez de rester sur les plaines. Moins dangereux, ce chemin est également plus long, vous perdez beaucoup de temps ! Au bout de quelques kilomètres, vous vous arrêtez pour vous reposer dans une auberge.

plains.text: Give up climbing to the top and stay close to the plains.

8.text: Vous avez décidé de profiter de l'été pour passer par les montagnes tant que les cols ne sont pas trop enneigés. Cependant, l'ascension s'avère plus difficile que prévu...

outcomes.0: For 15 minutes, you stare dumbly at the farmer fetching his pitchfork before leaving again.
After a quarter of an hour's searching, you find the pitchfork next to a pile of hay. To thank you, the farmer offers you a few coins.
outcomes.1: After half an hour's searching, you can't find the pitchfork. You do, however, discover an object that may be of use to you!
outcomes.2: Looking for the pitchfork, you step on it and give yourself a nasty gash.
outcomes.3: Vous cherchez la fourche pendant presque une heure, mais vous ne parvenez pas à la retrouver. Vous quittez poliment le paysan et continuez votre route.

help.text: Help the farmer find his pitchfork.

outcomes.0: You continue on your way without paying any attention to the farmer.
outcomes.1: Continuing across the field, you come across the pitchfork and severely cut your foot.

9.text: In the middle of a field, you meet a farmer. He has lost his pitchfork...
